Package ru.nsu.fit.smolyakov.snakegame.properties.level

Class CustomFileLevel

java.lang.Object
ru.nsu.fit.smolyakov.snakegame.properties.level.Level
ru.nsu.fit.smolyakov.snakegame.properties.level.CustomFileLevel
public final class CustomFileLevel extends Level
Creates a barrier from the specified text file. One should use '*' to represent a barrier point, and '.' to represent an empty point. The amount of rows and columns have to correspond with the game field size, however, this is not a requirement: if the file has fewer rows or columns than the game field, the barrier will be created only on the specified rows and columns; if the file has more rows or columns, the barrier will be created only on the specified rows and columns, and the rest of the file will be ignored.

If the file does not exist, the barrier is supposed to be empty.

This class is used as a DTO for the Barrier class, so the game level is actually created by Barrier.fromProperties(GameProperties) method.
